page.title: 13Nanpusker Farm,Hayle.
page.content: Nanpusker is situated on the South- East outskirts of Hayle.It means "Valley of the Fishes".Nanpusker Farm is owned by the Bodies and it has 196 acres of land,mainly crops. The farm has 120 Hereford Cross beef cattle but most of the farms profit comes from daffodil bulbs.They have to be stored in large bins and kept cool and dry.An inspector checks the bulbs for any damage or disease and if they are passed,the bulbs are exported to Holland and America.Also the farm grows barley,potatoes, cauliflower and broccoli. Nanpusker farm is highly mechanised Apart from cattle the farm has other animals.Mrs.Bodie breeds Dartmoor ponies she has 7 Dartmoor and 2 Arab cross and one of them is a Dartmoor champion.Mr.Bodies does his best to conserve wildlife around his farm.
